info.title: Party Management
info.description: This is Swagger UI environment generated for the TMF Party Management specification

post.description: Sets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

Organization.description: Represents a group of people identified by shared interests or purpose. Because of the complex nature of many businesses, both organizations and organization units are represented by the same business entity in this model.

isLegalEntity.description: To tag if the organization is a legal entity known by a national referential

existsDuring.description: Details the establishment of the organization and its cessation

tradingName.description: The name that the organization (unit) trades under

nameType.description: Co., Inc., Ltd., Pty Ltd., Plc., Gmbh.

status.description: Status of the organization (initialized, validated, closed)

Organization_Create.description:
Represents a group of people identified by shared interests or purpose. Because of the complex nature of many businesses, both organizations and organization units are represented by the same business entity in this model.
Skipped properties: id,href

isLegalEntity.description: To tag if the organization is a legal entity known by a national referential

existsDuring.description: Details the establishment of the organization and its cessation

tradingName.description: The name that the organization (unit) trades under

nameType.description: Co., Inc., Ltd., Pty Ltd., Plc., Gmbh.

status.description: Status of the organization (initialized, validated, closed)

Organization_Update.description:
Represents a group of people identified by shared interests or purpose. Because of the complex nature of many businesses, both organizations and organization units are represented by the same business entity in this model.
Skipped properties: id,href,id

isLegalEntity.description: To tag if the organization is a legal entity known by a national referential

existsDuring.description: Details the establishment of the organization and its cessation

tradingName.description: The name that the organization (unit) trades under

nameType.description: Co., Inc., Ltd., Pty Ltd., Plc., Gmbh.

status.description: Status of the organization (initialized, validated, closed)

RelatedPartyRef.description: RelatedParty reference. RelatedParty defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

id.description: Unique identifier of a related party

href.description: Reference of the related party, could be a party reference or a partyRole reference

validFor.description: Validity period of the related party

Characteristic.description: Describes the characteristics of an individual  or an organization such as individual hobbies, center of interests.

ExternalReference.description: To manage touch points to external OTT identifiers for the individual or the organization (facebook, google+,...)

IndividualIdentification.description: Represents our registration of information used as proof of identity by an individual (passport, national identity card, driver's license, social security number, birth certificate)

type.description: Identification type (passport, national identity card, driver's license, social security number, birth certificate)

issuingAuthority.description: Authority which has issued the identifier (social security, town hall...)

issuingDate.description: Date at which the identifier was issued

Disability.description: Lack or inadequate strength or ability

OtherName.description: To keep track of other names (for example the old name of a woman before marriage or an artist name)

title.description: useful for titles (aristocratic, social...) Dr, Pr, Sir...

fullName.description: Full name flatten (first, middle, and last name)

formattedName.description: A formatted name useful for specific contexts (chinese, japanese, korean...)

validFor.description: The period for which the other name is valid

tradingName.description: The name that the organization trades under

ContactMedium.description: Indicates the contact medium that could be used to contact the customer.

preferred.description: If true, indicates that is the preferred contact medium

type.description: Email address, telephone number, postal address

validFor.description: The time period that the contact medium is valid for

TimePeriod.description: A base / value business entity used to represent a period of time between two timepoints.

startDateTime.description: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

endDateTime.description: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

Medium.description: Describes the contact medium that could be used to contact the customer

emailAddress.description: Full email address in standard format

OrganizationParentRelationship.description: Represents the links between organizations: useful to describe an organization structure between headquarters, affiliates,... It indicates the parent of the organization.

id.description: Unique identifier of the parent organization

validFor.description: The time period the relationship is valid

OrganizationChildRelationship.description: Represents the links between organizations: useful to describe an organization structure between headquarters, affiliates,... It indicates the children of the organization

id.description: Unique identifier of the child organization

validFor.description: The time period the relationship is valid

OrganizationIdentification.description: Represents our registration of information used as proof of identity by an organization

type.description: Type of identification information used to identify the company in a country or internationally

issuingAuthority.description: Authority which has issued the identifier (chamber of commerce...)

issuingDate.description: Date at which the identifier was issued

validFor.description: The period for which the identification information is valid.

IndividualUpdateNotification.description: The IndividualUpdate notification is sent to each listener who has subscribed to receive it.

resourcePath.description: To indicate which entity is concerned

fieldPath.description: details which field is missing, its structure is quite similar to GET filter criteria

IndividualDeleteNotification.description: The IndividualDelete notification is sent to each listener who has subscribed to receive it.

IndividualEvent.description: The Individual event is generated each time an individual is created, updated or deleted.

OrganizationEvent.description: The Organization event is generated each time an organization has been created, changed or removed.

code.description: An integer coding the error type. This is given to caller so he can translate them if required.

message.description: A short localized string that describes the error.

description.description: (optional) A long localized error description if needed. It can contain precise information about which parameter is missing, or what are the identifier acceptable values.

infoURL.description: (optional) A URL to online documentation that provides more information about the error.
